query.name: get_all_region_data
query.sql:
SELECT uplink_location_region.region_id, uplink_region.region_name, uplink_locations.location_address_id, uplink_locations.name
FROM uplink_locations
LEFT JOIN uplink_location_region ON uplink_location_region.location_address_id=uplink_locations.location_address_id AND uplink_location_region.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_location_region.account_id=?
LEFT JOIN uplink_region ON uplink_region.region_id=uplink_location_region.region_id AND uplink_region.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_region.account_id=?
WHERE uplink_locations.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_locations.account_id=?
ORDER BY uplink_region.region_id DESC
